title: Shawn Michaels
summary: Michael Shawn Hickenbottom (born July 22, 1965), better known by his ring name Shawn Michaels, is an American retired professional wrestler. Widely regarded as the greatest in ring performer of all time,[8][9][10] he is known by the nicknames "Heartbreak Kid",[11] "The Showstopper", and "Mr. WrestleMania".
